topics.title: Overview and Installation
topics.summary: Describe the NiFi Toolkit CLI distribution, installation steps, and environment prerequisites.
topics.research_request: Explain how to install the NiFi Toolkit CLI, set up environment variables, and verify the install.

topics.title: CLI Modes and Usage
topics.summary: Detail interactive and standalone modes, command syntax, and help discovery.
topics.research_request: Document CLI invocation patterns, interactive shell features, and command discovery aids.

topics.title: Authentication and Context
topics.summary: Explain login strategies, proxy identities, and session persistence within the CLI.
topics.research_request: Summarize authentication options, session commands, and proxy handling in the NiFi CLI.

topics.title: Cluster Management Commands
topics.summary: Cover commands for connecting, disconnecting, and monitoring NiFi cluster nodes.
topics.research_request: Document NiFi CLI commands for managing cluster nodes, status checks, and troubleshooting.

topics.title: Flow Versioning Commands
topics.summary: Explain commands for importing, exporting, and promoting versioned flows with Registry.
topics.research_request: Provide step-by-step usage of CLI commands for flow version import/export and promotion.

topics.title: Parameter and Context Management
topics.summary: Detail commands that manage parameter contexts, providers, and inheritance across flows.
topics.research_request: Explain CLI commands for parameter contexts, including creation, inheritance, and provider interactions.

topics.title: Registry Automation
topics.summary: Describe automation workflows for bucket management, user policies, and artifact handling.
topics.research_request: Summarize CLI support for automating NiFi Registry buckets, policies, and artifact workflows.

topics.title: NAR Repository Management
topics.summary: Explain commands for uploading, listing, and managing NAR bundles via the CLI.
topics.research_request: Document CLI commands for managing NAR artifacts and coordinating with NiFi nodes.

topics.title: Security and TLS Tooling
topics.summary: Detail CLI support for TLS generation, certificate management, and secure configuration.
topics.research_request: Explain how to use the toolkit CLI to generate certificates, encrypt properties, and configure TLS.

topics.title: Diagnostics and Logging
topics.summary: Cover logging options, verbose modes, and troubleshooting patterns when commands fail.
topics.research_request: Provide troubleshooting tips, logging controls, and diagnostics commands for the CLI.

topics.title: Scripting and Automation
topics.summary: Explain how to script CLI commands, manage sessions programmatically, and integrate into CI pipelines.
topics.research_request: Describe approaches for scripting NiFi CLI commands and incorporating them into automation pipelines.
